allow:
Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -p 5433 -d chaldeas -c "
SELECT ''persons'' as table_name, COUNT\(*\) as count FROM persons
UNION ALL
SELECT ''locations'', COUNT\(*\) FROM locations
UNION ALL
SELECT ''events'', COUNT\(*\) FROM events;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -p 5433 -d chaldeas -c "SELECT id, name, LEFT\(embedding::text, 50\) as embedding_preview FROM persons WHERE embedding IS NOT NULL LIMIT 3;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -U chaldeas -h localhost -p 5432 -d chaldeas -c "SELECT id, name, LEFT\(embedding::text, 50\) as embedding_preview FROM persons WHERE embedding IS NOT NULL LIMIT 3;")
Bash("C:/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -h 34.22.103.164 -U chaldeas -d chaldeas -c "CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS vector;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -p 5433 -d chaldeas -c "
SELECT ''persons'' as table_name, COUNT\(*\) as count FROM persons
UNION ALL
SELECT ''events'', COUNT\(*\) FROM events
UNION ALL
SELECT ''locations'', COUNT\(*\) FROM locations
UNION ALL
SELECT ''event_persons'', COUNT\(*\) FROM event_persons
UNION ALL
SELECT ''event_locations'', COUNT\(*\) FROM event_locations
UNION ALL
SELECT ''categories'', COUNT\(*\) FROM categories
ORDER BY table_name;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -p 5433 -d chaldeas -c "SELECT c.name, COUNT\(*\) as count FROM events e LEFT JOIN categories c ON e.category_id = c.id GROUP BY c.name ORDER BY count DESC;")
Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -p 5432 -d chaldeas -c "\\d events")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -U chaldeas -h localhost -p 5432 -d chaldeas -c "SELECT ''events'' as t, COUNT\(*\) FROM events UNION ALL SELECT ''persons'', COUNT\(*\) FROM persons UNION ALL SELECT ''locations'', COUNT\(*\) FROM locations;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -U chaldeas -h localhost -p 5432 -d chaldeas -c "
SELECT ''events'' as table_name, COUNT\(*\) as count FROM events
UNION ALL SELECT ''persons'', COUNT\(*\) FROM persons
UNION ALL SELECT ''locations'', COUNT\(*\) FROM locations
UNION ALL SELECT ''event_aliases'', COUNT\(*\) FROM event_aliases
ORDER BY table_name;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -p 5433 -d chaldeas -c "SELECT ''events'' as t, COUNT\(*\) FROM events UNION ALL SELECT ''persons'', COUNT\(*\) FROM persons UNION ALL SELECT ''locations'', COUNT\(*\) FROM locations ORDER BY t;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -p 5432 -d chaldeas -c "SELECT ''events'' as t, COUNT\(*\) FROM events UNION ALL SELECT ''persons'', COUNT\(*\) FROM persons UNION ALL SELECT ''locations'', COUNT\(*\) FROM locations ORDER BY t;")
